data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Most of the matter around you will have more than one element in it. But ____ are ____ of ____ that ____ have ____ seen ____ touched ____ are ____ up ____ just ____ element. If ____ have ____ held a diamond, for ____, ____ has ____ formed ____ just ____ element, the ____ Carbon. Surprisingly, the graphite in a pencil that you use for drawing or writing is also Carbon, just arranged differently.
data.partBlankContent: Most of the matter around you will have more than one element in it. But th___ are bi__ of mat___ that y__ have cert_____ seen a__ touched th__ are ma__ up o_ just o__ element. If y__ have ev__ held a diamond, for exa____, i_ has be__ formed fr__ just o__ element, the ele____ Carbon. Surprisingly, the graphite in a pencil that you use for drawing or writing is also Carbon, just arranged differently.
data.answer: 你周围的大多数物质都有不止一种元素。但你肯定看到和接触过的物质中，有一些只是由一种元素组成的。例如，如果你曾经拿过一颗钻石，它就是由一种元素——碳元素构成的。令人惊讶的是，你用来画画或写字的铅笔里的石墨也是碳，只是排列方式不同。
